price: İsmail’i, İdris’i ve Zülkifl’i de an. Bunların hepsi sabredenlerdendi.
arabic: وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَإِدۡرِيسَ وَذَا ٱلۡكِفۡلِۖ كُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'māʿīla wa-id'rīsa wadhā al-kif'li kullun mina al-ṣābirīna
